name: red-orb
effect: Causes groudon to appear in the embedded tower.
short_effect: Summons Groudon to the Embedded Tower.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A shiny red orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It’s known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A shiny red orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It’s known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A shiny red orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It’s known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
